lead_paragraph: Seven months after Syria exported the last of its known stockpile of chemical weapons ingredients, the first of its 12 production facilities has been destroyed, the Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons reported Tuesday.
snippet: Seven months after Syria exported the last of its known stockpile of chemical weapons ingredients, the first of its 12 production facilities has been destroyed, the Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons reported Tuesday.
